snippet.title: Borderlands: Game of the Year Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Borderlands: Game of the Year Edition drops April 3rd!

Discover the co-op shooter-looter that started it all! With new weapons, visual upgrades, character heads, gold chests and keys, plus all 4 add-on packs, you can enjoy all of the content from one of the Most Acclaimed Games of its era, now in one sweet and deliciously modern package!

Music: "Meth Lab Zoso Sticker (Gadi Sassoon Remix)" by 7Horse

Subscribe and follow for more exclusive Borderlands info:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/borderlands
Facebook: https://facebook.com/borderlandsgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Borderlands
Website: https://borderlands.com
